name: Prnla [beta] URL Shortening Service
label: Shorten the link
description: Prnla - URL Shortening Service - Shorten the link
keywords: link, URL, short, shortening, expand, URL shortening service, Prnla

home.loading: The elves are hard at work...

howitworks.p3b: , then the short link will be displayed.

usage.p1a: Here's an example usage scenario of
usage.p2: Imagine Indonesia as the winner of World Cup 2058.
usage.p3: Now, this lengthy link with 72 characters,
usage.p5: only 17 characters. You're saving 72 - 17 = 55 characters, which you can use for the rest of the message itself.

example.partial: @friend http://beritakita.co.id/terkini/indonesia-akhirnya-juara-piala-dunia-2058 Finally, stayed up all night watching the final game, accompan
example.complete: @friend http://prn.la/g0L Finally, stayed up all night watching the final game, accompanied by peanuts and beer.

firefox.title: Firefox Add-on

chrome.pb: Similar to Pranafox, Pranachrome which also adds a right click menu option to shorten the selected URL using

api.p1a: If you'd like to use our API, please let us know via e-mail
api.p1b: We'll let you know if there's any modification to the API

message.p: json response includes a message property when there's an error.
message.alreadyshortened: The link is identified as shortened URLs from a URL shortener service
message.notfound: The provided short URL can not be found in Prnla

promosi.title: Spread the word
promosi.p: Tell your friends, family, neighbours, all about this web site. Do you have a blog or a Twitter account? please mention our site. Thanks.

perangkatlunak.p1: If you're a developer, you can help us by writing a client library for our
perangkatlunak.p3: in various programming languages (PHP, Ruby, Perl, Python, Java, etc).

kampanye.title: Poster
kampanye.p1: And for those who dare, you can print this poster in large size and stick it in public places. This is a picture of Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono, Indonesia's president and arguably the most powerful person on the archipelago.
kampanye.p2: Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono supports link shortening.
kampanye.p3: Any creative ideas and suggestions? Send them to

contact.p1a: If you'd like to comment, ask a question, criticise, or just say hi, we can be contacted via e-mail
contact.p2: And before you ask "WTH is pranala?"
contact.p3d: Pranala is the Indonesian terminology for link or URL.
